key_risks: Environmental sustainability concerns in the Memorialization segment
Global supply chain disruptions impacting production and costs
Regulatory and legal risks across multiple jurisdictions
Intense competitive pressures in Industrial Technologies and Brand Solutions
controversies: Federal lawsuit filed by Tesla alleging misappropriation of trade secrets
Lawsuit involving former employees accused of taking confidential information to a competitor
National Labor Relations Board (NLRB) case involving unfair labor practices
Past lawsuit alleging age discrimination during a reduction in force (RIF)
environmental_issues: Resource depletion and environmental sustainability concerns in the Memorialization segment
social_issues: Labor disputes and allegations of unfair labor practices
Age discrimination lawsuit during a reduction in force (RIF)
governance_issues: Compliance with complex and evolving environmental, safety, and trade regulations
Legal disputes and potential reputational damage
